headline: Ask HN: Sick with Covid in Spain, Google Fi suddenly cuts off my phone service
description:
I was delayed in Spain because of Covid. I evacuated here sick with Covid from Ukraine, just before the war. Suddenly Google Fi cuts off my service, with no warning. I have not received their email warning. Can somebody help me on HN? I edited out my case ID from the chat, but I can add it.

Welcome to Google Support. My name is Lohitha. How are you today? Lohitha · 1:32 PM hi 1:32 PM L Hi Alec! Please make a note of this case ID: 5-XXXXXXX for future reference. Lohitha · 1:32 PM I described the problem: I suddenly lost data connection today and cannot reconnet to data 1:32 PM L I see that you are facing issues with the international data connection. I will help you to the best of my expertise. Thanks for the details. Lohitha · 1:33 PM In the screenshot, all networks that now say Forbidden were available until today 1:34 PM L Okay. Are you on active military duty or a government employee? Lohitha · 1:35 PM no 1:35 PM L Thank you for the details. Lohitha · 1:35 PM this happened after I made a long call to a US phone number over WiFi 1:36 PM L Got it. I have checked the details and see that your international data capability is suspended. Lohitha · 1:39 PM Why? 1:39 PM L As per our Terms of Service, Fi must be primarily used in the United States (territories not included) and isn’t intended for extended international use. If you plan to stay abroad, we recommend you use a local carrier until you return to the US. Lohitha · 1:39 PM I had covid and I was delayed here I have documents that show that I have had covid recently 1:40 PM L Alec, I completely understand. I would have definitely helped you with this if there would have been any other alternative options. Lohitha · 1:42 PM I am returning to the US in 2 weeks: I even had to ask for a visa extension because I am sick. I hope you won't cut off my service because I have Covid? I can upload my doctor's letter and a positive PCR test 1:44 PM L Unfortunately, we don't have an option to provide exceptions for covid affected persons. I hope you understand. Your international data roaming capabilities are automatically reinstated once we determine that your services (data, talk and text) are primarily used in the United States (territories not included) as per our Terms of Service. Lohitha · 1:45 PM I am sick and you cut off my phone without warning! There was no warning whatsoever 1:45 PM L Alec, you must have received an email before 30 days as a remainder. Lohitha · 1:46 PM I have never received any email Nothing 1:46 PM L Please check if you have blocked the system automated emails. Lohitha · 1:46 PM I have not 1:46 PM L Google Fi will send an email before 30 days. Lohitha · 1:47 PM I have never seen the email And I cannot find it in my gmail account: I am looking no now 1:47 PM L I understand. Please check your gmail settings if you have any restrictions. Lohitha · 1:48 PM I did not set any restrictions. Since this is about disconnecting my phone, you could have called me or at least sent a text! can you please reinstate the service for 2 weeks? I am cut off from my banking, everything And I am sick 1:49 PM L Alec, it is an automated email system. Unfortunately, we don't have an option to send you a text or call. I hope you understand. I would have certainly helped you if there is any alternative option. It is my pleasure to assist you today! Have a good one! Lohitha left the chat. 1:50 PM Thanks for contacting Google Fi chat support. Your chat session is now complete.
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 在西班牙的Covid生病了，Google Fi突然切断了我的电话服务
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 在西班牙的Covid生病了，Google Fi突然切斷了我的電話服務
description_zh-Hans:
我在西班牙被耽搁了，因为科维德。我带着Covid从乌克兰疏散到这里，就在战争之前。突然间，Google Fi切断了我的服务，没有任何警告。我没有收到他们的电子邮件警告。有人能在HN上帮助我吗？我在聊天中编辑了我的案例ID，但我可以添加它。

欢迎来到谷歌支持。我的名字是Lohitha。你今天好吗？ Lohitha - 1:32 PM 嗨 1:32 PM L 嗨，Alec! 请记下这个案例的ID：5-XXXXXXX，供以后参考。 Lohitha - 1:32 PM 我描述了这个问题：我今天突然失去了数据连接，无法重新连接到数据。 1:32 PM L 我看到你正面临着国际数据连接的问题。我将尽我所能帮助你。 谢谢你的详细介绍。 Lohitha - 1:33 PM 在截图中，所有现在显示禁止的网络在今天之前都是可用的 1:34 PM L 好的。你是现役军人还是政府雇员？ Lohitha - 1:35 PM 不是 1:35 PM L 谢谢你的详细介绍。 Lohitha - 1:35 PM 这发生在我通过WiFi给一个美国电话号码打长途电话之后 1:36 PM L 明白了。 我已经检查了细节，发现你的国际数据功能被暂停了。 Lohitha - 1:39 PM 为什么？ 1:39 PM L 根据我们的服务条款，Fi必须主要在美国境内使用（不包括领土），不打算扩大国际使用。 如果你计划留在国外，我们建议你使用当地的运营商，直到你返回美国。 Lohitha - 1:39 PM 我有covid，我在这里被延误了 我有文件显示我最近做过covid。 下午1:40 L Alec，我完全理解。 如果有其他的选择，我肯定会帮你解决这个问题。 Lohitha - 1:42 PM 我2周后就要回美国了。我甚至不得不要求签证延期，因为我生病了。我希望你们不会因为我有科维德而切断我的服务？ 我可以上传我的医生信和PCR测试的阳性报告 下午1:44 L 不幸的是，我们没有选择为受Covid影响的人提供例外。我希望你能理解。 一旦我们确定您的服务（数据、通话和文本）主要在美国（不包括的地区）使用，根据我们的服务条款，您的国际数据漫游能力将自动恢复。 Lohitha - 1:45 PM 我生病了，你们没有警告就切断了我的电话! 根本没有任何警告 下午1:45 L Alec，你一定是在30天之前收到了一封邮件，作为剩余。 Lohitha - 1:46 PM 我从来没有收到过任何电子邮件 没有什么 1:46 PM L 请检查你是否屏蔽了系统自动发送的邮件。 Lohitha - 1:46 PM 我没有 1:46 PM L Google Fi会在30天之前发送一封邮件。 Lohitha - 1:47 PM 我从未见过这封邮件 我在我的Gmail账户中也找不到它。我正在寻找 现在 1:47 PM L 我明白了。如果你有任何限制，请检查你的Gmail设置。 Lohitha - 1:48 PM 我没有设置任何限制。既然是关于断开我的电话，你可以给我打电话，或者至少发个短信！你能不能恢复2周的服务？ 你能不能恢复2周的服务？我被切断了银行业务，一切都被切断了 而且我很难受 下午1:49 L 艾力克，这是一个自动的电子邮件系统。不幸的是，我们没有选项可以给你发短信或打电话。我希望你能理解。 如果有任何其他选择，我肯定会帮助你。 今天能帮助你是我的荣幸! 祝您愉快! Lohitha离开了聊天。 下午1:50 谢谢你联系Google Fi聊天支持。您的聊天会话现在已经完成。

Lohitha離開了聊天。 下午1:50 謝謝你聯繫Google Fi聊天支持。您的聊天會話現在已經完成。
